name: Ambassador Bethlehem
description: A new jewel in the heart of Bethlehem, near the Church of the Nativity. This upcoming property will offer luxury accommodation with panoramic views of the historical city and modern amenities for discerning travelers.
features: Walking distance to Church of the Nativity

name: Ambassador Tiberias
description: Overlooking the serene Sea of Galilee, Ambassador Tiberias will be a haven of tranquility. This lakeside resort will combine spiritual significance with resort-style luxury, perfect for both pilgrims and leisure travelers.
features: Direct beach access to Sea of Galilee
180 rooms with lake or garden views

name: Oud Amman
description: Our first venture into Jordan, Oud Amman will bring Ambassador Collection's signature hospitality to the vibrant capital. Located in the diplomatic quarter, it will serve as a gateway to Jordan's historical treasures.
features: Shuttle service to Petra and Dead Sea
